Description: TransDecoder finds coding regions within transcripts
EDAM_operation: Coding region prediction, de Novo sequencing, De-novo assembly
EDAM_operation_(no_superclasses): Coding region prediction, de Novo sequencing, De-novo assembly
EDAM_topic: Genomics, Gene transcripts, RNA-Seq, Gene expression, Sequence assembly, Whole genome sequencing
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Genomics, Gene transcripts, RNA-Seq, Gene expression, Sequence assembly, Whole genome sequencing
bio.tool_description: TransDecoder identifies candidate coding regions within transcript sequences, such as those generated by de novo RNA-Seq transcript assembly using Trinity, or constructed based on RNA-Seq alignments to the genome using Tophat and Cufflinks.
